title: Become Organized
description: This is a custom made website for a professional organizing business. Built as a static site using Bootstrap and then converted into a dynamic WordPress theme. The conversion to a WordPress theme required me to learn and use PHP to add functionalities to the site.  This included creating custom fields, allowing the client to edit information. I also added a blog section and integrated the client's Mailchimp mailing list sign up into the theme.

title: Childish Gambino
description: A simple one page tribute site for the rapper Childish Gambino. It features a bio section, as well as sections for his music videos and tour dates. I focused on becoming more comfortable with responsive design, without a CSS framework.  It was also an opportunity to get more familiar with Flexbox and CSS Grid. The interactive animations were developed with JQuery. I designed the site in Photoshop first and then converted that design into HTML and CSS.

title: Portfolio
description: One of my goals was to improve my skills with React and other modern front-end technologies. To do this, I decided that the static site generator Gatsby would be perfect to learn and build my portfolio. I felt it’d be a good way to challenge myself and use everything I’ve learned so far. Also, I liked that Gatsby would allow me to create a fast site that I could add features to and keep updated.
